title: Chapters 1692 - All Daos Return To The Path Of The Sword
body:
Chapters 1692 - All Daos Return To The Path Of The Sword

Su Yi’s gaze was still tranquil and ethereal. He showed no sign of awakening whatsoever.

However, an earth-shaking transformation was taking place within him. His Immortal Origin Space was expanding seemingly beyond measure, like an endless abyss.

The Immortal Origin Space contained the cultivation base. The deeper one’s cultivation, the firmer and larger the Immortal Origin Space, and the more Immortal Origin it could contain.

The Immortal Origin Space was incomparably profound, like a self-contained universe. It could contain all manner of Grand Daos and manifest celestial bodies, the cycles of the earth, and creation in all facets.

Those with particularly firm foundations could even transform their Immortal Origin Space so that it took on different shapes!

Then, as their cultivation deepened and their control over their Immortal Laws increased, they could materialize the wondrous transformations of their Immortal Origin Space in the outside world!

Wang Ye, for instance, had manifested a thirty-three-layer sword domain within his Immortal Origin Space. Upon reaching the pinnacle of the Immortal Dao, when he circulated his cultivation base, he could effortlessly manifest this thirty-three-layer...
original_title: Chapters 1692 - All Daos Return to the Path of the Sword
